title: A Short History Of...
sample: What's going on here? It may look like a humble gig, but in fact it was an all-expenses paid trip to a luxury resort on the coast of Turkey. Early one morning Chris (right) went out and took the picture below, just as I was finally headed to sleep (why?). Yes, that's me â€“ awoken from daytime slumber only to provide thirty minutes of thump, eager to return to nocturnalism.
